title: How to Be Friendly With a Metro Protectron! (Fallout 3)

steps.headline: When you are in an Underground Metro Station, search every room for a metro ticket.
steps.description: They are usually in boxes, crates and filing cabinets. Keep looking around for them; sometimes they can be hard to find.

steps.headline: Find the Protectron and activate it, either by going to a terminal and hacking it to start the Protectron, or just opening the Protectron-Pod.
Once you have your ticket, you are, to the eyes of Protectron, an ally.
steps.description: This means the Protectron will not attack you, and will instead patrol the metro and search for enemies and attack them.

steps.headline: Protectrons are good if you have low health, because you can use them to attack other creatures and protect you.
steps.description: This will only work as long as you have a metro ticket.

text: When you are in an Underground Metro Station, search every room for a metro ticket. They are usually in boxes, crates and filing cabinets. Keep looking around for them; sometimes they can be hard to find. Find the Protectron and activate it, either by going to a terminal and hacking it to start the Protectron, or just opening the Protectron-Pod.  Once you have your ticket, you are, to the eyes of Protectron, an ally. This means the Protectron will not attack you, and will instead patrol the metro and search for enemies and attack them. Protectrons are good if you have low health, because you can use them to attack other creatures and protect you. This will only work as long as you have a metro ticket.
